tasks.title: Gemini AI Integration for Spot Discovery
tasks.description: Integrate Google Gemini API to generate location suggestions based on destination and trip preferences
tasks.details:
1. Install google-generativeai package
2. Create lib/gemini.ts with Gemini API configuration
3. Design prompts for spot generation with categories (Popular, Museum, Nature, Foodie, History, Shopping)
4. Return structured JSON with spot name, description, category, coordinates, images
5. Add error handling and retry logic
6. Store EXPO_PUBLIC_GEMINI_API_KEY in .env
tasks.testStrategy: Test spot generation with various destinations, verify category filtering works, test error handling

tasks.title: Multi-Step Trip Creation Wizard
tasks.description: Build 4-step trip creation flow: Destination Search, Trip Preferences, Duration Picker, and AI Spot Discovery
tasks.details:
Step 1 - Destination Search:
- 'Where are we going?' header with blue gradient
- Search input with country autocomplete
- Country suggestions with flag emojis

Step 2 - Trip Preferences:
- Category chips: Popular, Museum, Nature, Foodie, History, Shopping
- Multi-select functionality

Step 3 - Duration Picker:
- 'How many days?' header
- Dates/Flexible toggle
- Scroll wheel picker (1-14 days)

Step 4 - Discover Spots:
- AI-generated spots from Gemini
- Category filter tabs
- Spot list with images and checkboxes
- 'Continue without spots' option
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete wizard flow, verify each step transitions correctly, test spot selection

tasks.title: AI Trip Planner with Map Visualization
tasks.description: Create trip planner with AI-generated itinerary, route on map with numbered markers, and day-by-day view
tasks.details:
1. 'Your days aren't full yet' prompt with 'Yes, plan for me!' button
2. AI generates optimized day-by-day itinerary
3. Map view with:
   - Numbered markers (1, 2, 3...)
   - Route polylines per day (different colors)
   - Day distance labels
4. Bottom sheet with:
   - Trip name and Share button
   - Overview/Itinerary tabs
   - Day summaries with spot names
   - 'Unplanned' section for unused spots
5. Save trip and spots to Supabase
6. Show trip spots on main Map screen
tasks.testStrategy: Test AI itinerary generation, verify map markers and routes display, test trip saving
